body_content.explanation: a hard cover in which paper documents or magazines are stored:
examples: He's filled five binders with notes.

body_content.explanation: a machine used on farms to fasten crops into sheaves (= bundles) after they have been cut:
examples: The way to harvest cereals 50 years ago was to use a binder, that cut the crop and tied it up in sheaves.

body_content.explanation: a substance added to a mixture to make all the parts stick together:
examples: You can use egg as a binder.

body_content.explanation: a strip of material wrapped tightly around part of the body to firmly press or hold it in place, for example after surgery (= a medical operation):
examples: Compression devices such as abdominal binders and compression stockings may help.

body_content.explanation: a special piece of clothing that some people, especially transgender people (= people whose gender does not match the body they were born with), wear to make their chests appear flatter by holding their breasts flat:
examples: One of the most important parts of choosing the right binder for you is getting the right size.
Can you recommend a company that makes good binders for busty individuals?
This transgender nonprofit ships free binders to people who need them.
